name: Misshapen (itch)
description:
Use your powers to provoke uncontrolled cellular growth and collect all the secrets.

* Misshapen is an obscure creepy game designed during the early days of the PlayStation System. In the summer of 2013, a copy of the original GDD was recovered by the police after the murder of a 45 years old guy in Tokyo. Two or three years later, someone upload the GDD to the internet. The document includes some innovative ways of handling physics that would've been revolutionary in the late 90's.
